name: autoappversion
description: A build and release task for automaticaly incrementing an app's version
author: ThatBlokeCalledJay

inputs.name: ProjectFile
inputs.label: The .csproj file to be read and updated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The .csproj file which will supply the versioning pattern and will be updated with the newly incremented version

inputs.name: VersionVariable
inputs.label: The saved version variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the saved variable. The value should be in the format '1.6.3'.

inputs.name: DevOpsPAT
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your personal access token for Azure DevOps
